imdb.plot outline: Ten documentary films of ten traditional trails of five continents which feature some of most dramatic sights that can only be experienced directly and simply by walking. "Walking the World" series compromising of 10x60 minutes documentary films, 10x45 minutes version and 3x60 minutes compilation, made by André Singer's West Park Pictures for Travel Channel (US) and Discovery HD Theatre (US), Reader's Digest Video (worldwide), Voyage (France), RTBF (Belgium) and for international distribution via Southern Star: 1) China: THE GREAT WALL OF CHINA 2) Ireland: THE DINGLE PENINSULA 3) Austria: SALZKAMMERGUT 4) Italy: UMBRIA 5) Tanzania: MOUNT KILIMANJARO 6) Alaska: THE CHILKOOT TRAIL 7) Peru: THE INCA TRAIL 8) USA: THE GRAND CANYON 9) France: THE CATHAR 10) New Zealand: THE HOLLYFORD TRAIL. And 3x60 minutes compilation for Reader's Digest: 1) OUR DRAMATIC PLANET 2) HISTORIC PATHWAYS 3) ROMANCE WITH NATURE.
imdb.title: Walking the World
plot: Trek through the world's most magnificent landscapes, venture off the beaten track to discover the sights tourists rarely see and the chance to get close to nature only by walking.

Ten documentary films of ten traditional trails of five continents which feature some of most dramatic sights that can only be experienced directly and simply by walking. "_Walking the World_ (qv)" series compromising of 10x60 minutes documentary films, 10x45 minutes version and 3x60 minutes compilation, made by André Singer's West Park Pictures for Travel Channel (US) and Discovery HD Theatre (US), Reader's Digest Video (worldwide), Voyage (France), RTBF (Belgium) and for international distribution via Southern Star: 1) China: THE GREAT WALL OF CHINA 2) Ireland: THE DINGLE PENINSULA 3) Austria: SALZKAMMERGUT 4) Italy: UMBRIA 5) Tanzania: MOUNT KILIMANJARO 6) Alaska: THE CHILKOOT TRAIL 7) Peru: THE INCA TRAIL 8) USA: THE GRAND CANYON 9) France: THE CATHAR 10) New Zealand: THE HOLLYFORD TRAIL. And 3x60 minutes compilation for Reader's Digest: 1) OUR DRAMATIC PLANET 2) HISTORIC PATHWAYS 3) ROMANCE WITH NATURE.
